Package org.zurdavid.petrinets.view

Class GraphStreamReachabilityGraph

java.lang.Object
org.graphstream.graph.implementations.AbstractElement
org.graphstream.graph.implementations.AbstractGraph
org.graphstream.graph.implementations.AdjacencyListGraph
org.graphstream.graph.implementations.MultiGraph
org.zurdavid.petrinets.view.GraphStreamReachabilityGraph
All Implemented Interfaces:
Iterable<org.graphstream.graph.Node>, org.graphstream.graph.Element, org.graphstream.graph.Graph, org.graphstream.graph.Structure, org.graphstream.stream.AttributeSink, org.graphstream.stream.ElementSink, org.graphstream.stream.Pipe, org.graphstream.stream.Replayable, org.graphstream.stream.Sink, org.graphstream.stream.Source, IReachabilityGraphView
public class GraphStreamReachabilityGraph extends org.graphstream.graph.implementations.MultiGraph implements IReachabilityGraphView
The class is an implementation of the interface IReachabilityGraphView using the GraphStream library (it derives from MultiGraph) to display a reachability graph. It is part of the applications view.
